description: Irregular triangular array T read by rows: T(n,0) = 1 for i >= 0, T(1,1) = 1,T(2,1) = 1, T(2,2) = 2, T(2,3) = 1, T(2,4) = 1 and for n >= 3, T(n,1) = n-1,  T(n,k) = T(n-1,k-2) + T(n-1,k-1) + T(n-1,k) for k=2,...,n+1, and T(n, k+2) = T(n-1, k) + T(n-1, k+1).
